verses.verse: Call <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8798><s%> now, if there be <S%H3426><s%> any that will answer <S%H6030><s%> <S%H8802><s%> thee; and to which of the saints <S%H6918><s%> wilt thou turn <S%H6437><s%> <S%H8799><s%> ?
For wrath <S%H3708><s%> killeth <S%H2026><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the foolish man <S%H191><s%>, and envy <S%H7068><s%> slayeth <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8686><s%> the silly one <S%H6601><s%> <S%H8802><s%>.
I have seen <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the foolish <S%H191><s%> taking root <S%H8327><s%> <S%H8688><s%>: but suddenly <S%H6597><s%> I cursed <S%H5344><s%> <S%H8799><s%> his habitation <S%H5116><s%>.

His children <S%H1121><s%> are far <S%H7368><s%> <S%H8799><s%> from safety <S%H3468><s%>, and they are crushed <S%H1792><s%> <S%H8691><s%> in the gate <S%H8179><s%>, neither is there any to deliver <S%H5337><s%> <S%H8688><s%> them.

Whose harvest <S%H7105><s%> the hungry <S%H7457><s%> eateth up <S%H398><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and taketh <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8799><s%> it even out <S%H413><s%> of the tshofars <S%H6791><s%>, and the robber <S%H6782><s%> swalloweth up <S%H7602><s%> <S%H8804><s%> their substance <S%H2428><s%>.

Although affliction <S%H205><s%> cometh not forth <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8799><s%> of the dust <S%H6083><s%>, neither doth trouble <S%H5999><s%> spring out <S%H6779><s%> <S%H8799><s%> of the ground <S%H127><s%>;
Yet man <S%H120><s%> is born <S%H3205><s%> <S%H8795><s%> unto trouble <S%H5999><s%>, as the sparks <S%H1121><s%> <S%H7565><s%> fly <S%H5774><s%> <S%H8800><s%> upward <S%H1361><s%> <S%H8686><s%>.
I would seek <S%H199><s%> <S%H1875><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto 'Elohim <S%H410><s%>, and unto 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> would I commit <S%H7760><s%> <S%H8799><s%> my cause <S%H1700><s%>:
Which doeth <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8802><s%> great things <S%H1419><s%> and unsearchable <S%H369><s%> <S%H2714><s%>; marvellous things <S%H6381><s%> <S%H8737><s%> without number <S%H4557><s%>:

Who giveth <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8802><s%> rain <S%H4306><s%> upon <S%H6440><s%> the earth <S%H776><s%>, and sendeth <S%H7971><s%> <S%H8802><s%> waters <S%H4325><s%> upon <S%H6440><s%> the fields <S%H2351><s%>:

To set up <S%H7760><s%> <S%H8800><s%> on high <S%H4791><s%> those that be low <S%H8217><s%>; that those which mourn <S%H6937><s%> <S%H8802><s%> may be exalted <S%H7682><s%> <S%H8804><s%> to safety <S%H3468><s%>.

He disappointeth <S%H6565><s%> <S%H8688><s%> the devices <S%H4284><s%> of the crafty <S%H6175><s%>, so that their hands <S%H3027><s%> cannot perform <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> their enterprise <S%H8454><s%>.

He taketh <S%H3920><s%> <S%H8802><s%> the wise <S%H2450><s%> in their own craftiness <S%H6193><s%>: and the counsel <S%H6098><s%> of the froward <S%H6617><s%> <S%H8737><s%> is carried headlong <S%H4116><s%> <S%H8737><s%>.
They meet <S%H6298><s%> <S%H8762><s%> with darkness <S%H2822><s%> in the daytime <S%H3119><s%>, and grope <S%H4959><s%> <S%H8762><s%> in the noonday <S%H6672><s%> as in the night <S%H3915><s%>.
But he saveth <S%H3467><s%> <S%H8686><s%> the poor <S%H34><s%> from the sword <S%H2719><s%>, from their mouth <S%H6310><s%>, and from the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the mighty <S%H2389><s%>.
So the poor <S%H1800><s%> hath hope <S%H8615><s%>, and iniquity <S%H5766><s%> stoppeth <S%H7092><s%> <S%H8804><s%> her mouth <S%H6310><s%>.

Behold, happy <S%H835><s%> is the man <S%H582><s%> whom 'Elohim <S%H433><s%> correcteth <S%H3198><s%> <S%H8686><s%>: therefore despise <S%H3988><s%> <S%H8799><s%> not thou the chastening <S%H4148><s%> of 'El SHaddai <S%H7706><s%>:

For he maketh sore <S%H3510><s%> <S%H8686><s%>, and bindeth up <S%H2280><s%> <S%H8799><s%>: he woundeth <S%H4272><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and his hands <S%H3027><s%> make whole <S%H7495><s%> <S%H8799><s%>.
He shall deliver <S%H5337><s%> <S%H8686><s%> thee in six <S%H8337><s%> troubles <S%H6869><s%>: yea, in seven <S%H7651><s%> there shall no evil <S%H7451><s%> touch <S%H5060><s%> <S%H8799><s%> thee.
In famine <S%H7458><s%> he shall redeem <S%H6299><s%> <S%H8804><s%> thee from death <S%H4194><s%>: and in war <S%H4421><s%> from the power <S%H3027><s%> of the sword <S%H2719><s%>.

Thou shalt be hid <S%H2244><s%> <S%H8735><s%> from the scourge <S%H7752><s%> of the tongue <S%H3956><s%>: neither shalt thou be afraid <S%H3372><s%> <S%H8799><s%> of destruction <S%H7701><s%> when it cometh <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%>.

At destruction <S%H7701><s%> and famine <S%H3720><s%> thou shalt laugh <S%H7832><s%> <S%H8799><s%>: neither shalt thou be afraid <S%H3372><s%> <S%H8799><s%> of the beasts <S%H2416><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%>.

For thou shalt be in league <S%H1285><s%> with the stones <S%H68><s%> of the field <S%H7704><s%>: and the beasts <S%H2416><s%> of the field <S%H7704><s%> shall be at peace <S%H7999><s%> <S%H8717><s%> with thee.

And thou shalt know <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8804><s%> that thy tabernacle <S%H168><s%> shall be in peace <S%H7965><s%>; and thou shalt visit <S%H6485><s%> <S%H8804><s%> thy habitation <S%H5116><s%>, and shalt not sin <S%H2398><s%> <S%H8799><s%>.
Thou shalt know <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8804><s%> also that thy seed <S%H2233><s%> shall be great <S%H7227><s%>, and thine offspring <S%H6631><s%> as the grass <S%H6212><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%>.

Thou shalt come <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to thy grave <S%H6913><s%> in a full age <S%H3624><s%>, like as a shock of corn <S%H1430><s%> cometh in <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8800><s%> in his season <S%H6256><s%>.
Lo this, we have searched <S%H2713><s%> <S%H8804><s%> it, so it is; hear <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8798><s%> it, and know <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8798><s%> thou it for thy good.
